metadata.title: CVE-2022-48773 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:xprtrdma: fix pointer derefs in error cases of rpcrdma_ep_createIf there are failures then we must not leave the non-NULL pointers withthe error value, otherwise `rpcrdma_ep_destroy` gets confused and triesfree them, resulting in an Oops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
